body.name: WuayMiy Iron Steamer for Clothes Garment Steamers 1000W 5S Fast Heat-up Mini Steamers Portable Handheld Iron 180° Foldable Small Iron for Travel Dry Wet (Purple)
features: ✅FAST & EFFICIENT - Our handheld steamer can heat up in 15 seconds with a 1000-watt output for constant temperature ironing, which is perfect for those on-the-go moments. Much faster than traditional steam irons, continuously output steam with one button opening, which can easily and effectively soften the fibers of clothes deeply, and remove various wrinkles and stubborn creases

✅2-IN-1 PORTABLE HANDHELD STEAMER IRON - The mini garment steamer with a foldable handle is capable of both flat ironing and hanging ironing, can be used as a normal iron or a steam iron to meet different ironing needs. And our micro steam iron offers both dry and wet ironing options, so you can choose the best method for your clothes
✅POINTED CURVED DESIGN - Our iron's triangular tip shape allows for easy ironing of narrow areas like buttons, plackets, and collars. You can achieve a polished, professional look with ease

✅ COMPACT SIZE FOR TRAVEL - The foldable handle design of the portable steamer iron for clothes provides convenience for your storage. Thanks to its lightweight and compact size, you can take this mini steam iron with you on vacation or traveling, our steamer is easy to store in any suitcase

✅ WIDELY AND SAFETY TO USE - Heated panel at constant temperature of 300℉, ceramic sheet heating, ironing does not hurt clothes, can be used on all kinds of fabrics, such as silk, plush, wool, cotton, linen, polyester, nylon and so on

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Steamer Iron for Clothes1000W Fast Heat-up Handheld Mini Steam Iron 180° Foldable Iron for Dry & Wet Perfect for Home, Office, and Travel

Our 180° foldable handheld steamer is easy to store and carry for travel or home use, design with 1.5m long enough power cord. It also comes with measure cup for easy and convenient water supply One-click opening The design features of this Travel Mini Steam Iron is one-click opening, making it easy and convenient to use Fast heating Equipped with 1000-Watt heating power, our Mini Steam Iron heats up quickly and delivers fast and powerful steam output for efficient ironing

Mini Steam Iron can be used for both garment steamer hanging and flat ironing, providing versatility for all your ironing needs, Suitable for all types of fabric, including delicate silk and lace, as well as cotton, wool, and denim. FUNCTION: • Experience swift and powerful ironing with our 1000W mini steam iron. • It boasts a spill-free 100 ml water tank, which fills up conveniently using the included filling cup. • In 15 quick seconds, it warms up, and in 3 minutes, your clothes are ready to wear - crisp and wrinkle-free. • The mini steam iron's lightweight and compact design makes it a must-have for travel. Its pointed curved design ensures impeccable ironing detailing, keeping your outfits always at their elegant best.
The Ideal Travel Companion We firmly believe that everyone should enjoy life to the fullest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Convenient, and Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: This Iron and Steamer in one is great! Quick and easy to use and it is so cute! Perfect for traveling(which I do a lot). It also arrived very quickly! Would definitely buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Power for Wrinkle-Free Travel"
reviews.reviewText: I received a great product today! This portable handheld steamer impresses with its rapid heating, taking mere seconds to be ready for use. Its compact size and lightweight design make it ideal for travel. The ease of use and comfortable grip enhance the overall experience, making it a convenient alternative to traditional irons. The robust steam output sets it apart, providing effective wrinkle removal. Overall, a reliable choice for on-the-go garment care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact iron is perfect for travel or home use.
reviews.reviewText: This iron is a nice compact size, heats up immediately, and is simple to use. The small size is great for keeping in the sewing room for quilting and sewing projects. Lightweight and small to use for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the color, look and feel of this steamer. I was also totally surprised to see how well this little steamer works. Overall a very handy steamer to have at home or while traveling. Its very powerful, comfortable to hold, and irons out creases very quickly and effortlessly. I truly highly recommend this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality, sturdy, portable iron
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very good quality, sturdy, portable iron. Looks amazing and feels super sturdy. I ordered one from temu which looks exactly like this but it's so flimsy compared to what I received on Amazon. Very Happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This product is great! It heats up and starts steaming immediately, and produces the perfect amount of steam. I was able to iron my super wrinkly pants in about 5 minutes, and they looks perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily to carry
reviews.reviewText: It’s super user friendly and convenient. The cable is long and comes with a measuring cup. I go to business trips a lot and don’t have time to iron my clothes before leaving, so having this portable one would be a lifesaver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is great size for a college student to use.It doesn’t take much space in my room and it help me to iron all my outfit before any meeting I go to
